content: Wow…..this coming from a man whose wet nurse was Henry Cisneros. Both scum bags from the same cut of cloth. Not sure how he was named to the “intelligence committee”. Would have thought that he would be much more effective on the “entitlement committee”. Just make sure Joaquin, that your girl “Nobody Nothing” Rice appears and testifies under oath. And if anybody broke the rules/law (Obama, Trump, Rice, etc.)……them hang em!
